name: Sandro Mirianashvili
title: Senior Software Engineer
summary: Senior Software Engineer with 6+ years of experience building backend-heavy systems and web applications. Strong background in .NET, distributed systems, search technologies, and mentoring students. Passionate about clean architecture, scalable systems, and teaching.

projects.name: Student Portfolio Management System
projects.description: Web application for managing and showcasing student portfolios.
highlights: Designed and implemented core backend functionality
Delivered a production-ready system within a short time frame

experience.summary: Working on scalable backend systems and business-critical applications.
details: Designed and maintained backend services using C# and .NET
Worked with Elasticsearch, Kafka, and RabbitMQ for distributed systems

experience.summary: Developed and maintained internal web applications.
details: Built features using ASP.NET MVC and Microsoft SQL Server
Improved system performance and code quality

experience.summary: Teaching programming and software engineering concepts.
details: Explaining algorithms, data structures, and best practices
Created Python course syllabus from scratch
Taught Python, C++, and programming fundamentals
Developed a student portfolio management web application
Collaborated with a small team to deliver features quickly
